PaymentSchedulePolicy.name: PaymentSchedulePolicy
PaymentSchedulePolicy.description: Contains configuration information for the payment schedule policy.

Description.description: User-entered description of the payment schedule policy.

IsOrgDefault.description: true if the payment schedule policy is the default policy for the org, otherwise false. An org can have a maximum of one default payment policy.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

Name.description: The user-entered name of the payment policy.

OwnerId.description: ID of the creator of this object.
